Today at Saltburn Beach, expect clean 1 ft @ 6s SE with a moderate 11 mph SW wind. It's a great time to hit the water, especially between 08:23 and 15:38. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 2 ft @ 5s S with fresh 20 mph SSW winds, making it less favorable. Day after, still poor with 1 ft @ 3s S and 9 mph SSW winds. Best: today.
